message: I have a unique opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this high-value product to you at a competitive price. I'm thinking of starting with $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for this product.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.

I understand that $10,000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking of counteroffering at $11,500. This is the best I can do, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $11,250. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can wrap up the deal here.
